member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.CUIDataSource
member.summary: Represents an abstract class that loads an XML document, retrieves a subset of its data, and applies customizations to the XML by replacing or removing some of the nodes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.Ribbon
member.summary: Renders the Server ribbon on a page. Do not use types or members of the namespace for development within a SharePoint environment, but instead use and related types in the namespace. For information about customizing the ribbon in SharePoint Foundation see Server Ribbon in SharePoint Foundation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryResultFormat
member.summary: Determines the format of the query result.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryResultFormat.JSON
member.summary: Format the query result in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryResultFormat.XML
member.summary: Format the query result in XML.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType
member.summary: Represents the type of query that is being made for Server ribbon data. This enumeration is used in Microsoft SharePoint Foundation by the commandui.ashx HTTP handler.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType.None
member.summary: The query type is not specified.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType.All
member.summary: Retrieve all the Server ribbon XML.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType.RibbonVisibleTabDeep
member.summary: Perform a shallow retrieval of all Server ribbon tabs. This type of retrieval includes the ribbon tab node and attributes but does not include the child nodes of the ribbon tab node. This type of retrieval also includes the deep retrieval of a single tab node.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType.RibbonShallow
member.summary: Perform a shallow retrieval of all the Server ribbon tabs. This type of retrieval includes only the tab node and its attributes; no child nodes are included.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType.RibbonTab
member.summary: Perform a deep retrieval of one Server ribbon tab. This type of retrieval includes the child nodes in addition to the tab node and its attributes.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Web.CommandUI.UIQueryType.Root
member.summary: Retrieve a complete "root". Because, in Microsoft SharePoint Foundation, the only root that is used is the Server ribbon, this type of query retrieves the entire ribbon node including all of its ancestors, as well as all the nodes beneath it. You still have to set the ID to the Id attribute of the root node. So, the Ribbon node Id in SharePoint Foundation is set to "Ribbon".

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Writes an XML node as JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).
member.param: The XML document that is converted to JSON.
The where the conversion results are written.
